info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 11:28PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Areas of Dense fog developing across portions of the Rio grande Valley... At 1130 PM, surface observations and satellite imagery indicate that areas of dense fog are developing across portions of Kenedy, Willacy, Cameron and Hidalgo Counties reducing the visibilities down to one quarter to one half of a mile in some locations. The worst of the fog is affecting the Brownsville, Harlingen, Bayview and Edinburg areas at this time. These areas of dense fog will likely persist through the overnight hours. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed for portions of Deep South Texas and the Rio Grande Valley later tonight or early Thursday morning. Late night motorists should be aware of locally dense fog with visibility changing rapidly over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road.
